alert.note: Alert for Dunklin; Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 4:03PM CDT until June 16 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MISSISSIPPI...SOUTHWESTERN PEMISCOT AND SOUTHERN DUNKLIN COUNTIES... At 402 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hornersville, or near Senath, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Blytheville, Kennett, Gosnell, Manila, Senath, Cardwell, Hornersville, Arbyrd, Calumet, Buckeye, Arkmo, Woodland Corner, Pawheen, Noland, Poplar Corner, Garson, Stark City, Boynton, Yarbro and Bertig. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
